synopsis.text: Get ready for an action-packed virtual pro wrestling match featuring Vocaloid characters Miku and Rin teaming up as the "Cutie Angels" to take on the formidable duo of Meiko and Luka. Providing excitable ringside commentary is none other than fan favorite KAITO, while Len steps into the ring as referee to officiate the bout. This epic showdown is brought to life through the musical storytelling of talented producer Mitchie M, serving as the lead track on his highly anticipated 2nd album "Virtual Popstar" which released in November 2019. With character designs crafted by acclaimed anime artist Haruhiko Mikimoto of "Macross" fame, the album cover further builds the hype. Can the scrappy Cutie Angels pull off the upset against their ruthless opponents? Let the bell ring to start this clash of Vocaloid titans! Whether you're a longtime fan hungry for new music or seeking an entry point into Mitchie M's discography, this pro wrestling-themed tune looks primed to earn a quick pin and your repeated listens.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
